record.description: University of Chicago Varsity Football Squad, 1935. Fourth row: Jack Fetman, Robert Wheeler, Paul Antonic, David Gordon, Henry Cutter, William Gillerlain, and Kendall Peterson; third row: Judge R. J. Dunn (assistant coach), William Bosworth Jr., James Chapple, Andrew Hoyt, Nelson Thomas, Woodrow Wilson, Jerome Sivesind, Henry Kellogg, Marvin Channon, Fred Lehnhardt, Robert Shipway, Adolph Shuessler, J. K. Anderson (assistant coach), and Walter Bock (trainer): second row: O. E. Strohmeier (assistant coach), J. Lopez (assistant coach), Murray Chilton, Robert Fitzgerald, Harmon Meigs, Earl Sappington, Sam Whiteside, Clarence Wright, Warren Skoning, Edward Bartlett, Omar Fareed, Prescott Jordan, and C. D. Shaughnessy (coach); first row: Ernest Dix, Stanley Marynowski, Edmund Wolfenson, Robert Perretz, Merritt Bush, Jay Berwanger (captain), Gordon Peterson, Ewald Nyquist, Victor Jones, Paul Whitney, and Daniel Blake.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
